text: Good, comfortable and easy access. Not an  ideal entry/exit point for bicycles unless you're prepared to carry it up/down the flight of stairs
I wish npark would make a legit stairway like other areas.
Entrance to rail corridor from Henderson rd

This is the entrance to the Green Corridor = Rail Corridor.

Postscript February 2024

It has finally been fixed!
Now you have beautiful stairs!

The following is a description of 2021. It's nostalgic, so I'll leave it here with old photos.

It's hard to see from above unless you get close.

Please be careful as it is a bit steep and the footing is not stable.
